title: Women musalla in malls is far from men area
transcript: 90s third question she says that the prayer hall of women in moles in some Masjid are usually far away from the man's main hall and there is a partition that we cannot see them so what's the ruling on praying there the answer is as long as the whole area is called masala or a Masjid and the voice of the mmm reaches them they're praying there with the Imam is permissible and there's nothing wrong with that in shock
